name: checkprmerged
friendlyName: GitOps - Retrieve commit associated Pull Request (if found)
description: Retrieves associated Pull Request to this commit and outputs its status
author: Ahmed Sabbour

outputvariables.name: prnumber
outputvariables.description: The associated Pull Request number (if found)

outputvariables.name: prstatus
outputvariables.description: The status of the Pull Request

outputvariables.name: mergestatus
outputvariables.description: The merge status of the Pull Request
